Pre-Game Insights: The Cardinals took on the New York Yankees in their weekend set, splitting the first two games and winning the third.
Andre Pallante will start for the Cardinals, with a 6-6 record and a 3.80 ERA in 24 games (15 starts).
Freddy Peralta will start for the Brewers, with a 9-7 record and a 3.70 ERA over 27 starts.
Five of the Brewers' last six day games against NL Central opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Eight of the Cardinals' last 10 day games against National League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
